そうか……助けになったのなら良かった……\nそういえば、さっきのカオスメイデンっ:
I see... I'm glad I was able to help...
Come to think of it, what were those Chaos Maidens just now?
メイズシフターと戦ってるうちに、\n別のとこに移動しちゃったみたいだね。:
While I was fighting the maise shifter...
Looks like they've moved somewhere else.
……ところで、どこでそんな指揮能力を身に着けたんですか？\n凄い的確でしたし、自:
...By the way, where did you learn to command like that?
It was incredibly accurate, and my body naturally moved.
俺もわからない……\nなぜか、こういうときの戦い方を知っていたんだ。:
I don't know either...
For some reason, I knew how to fight at times like this.
ただ、俺の指揮が良かったというよりも……\n君たちが的確に動いてくれたのが大きか:
But it's not that I was good at commanding...
I think it was a big deal that you guys moved with precision.
まあ、とんでもないＧで死にそうになったけども……: Well, I was on the verge of dying from an unbelievable g-force...
あっ！ そ、そういえば服も着ずに乗っていたんでした！\n気分が悪かったりしません:
Oh! I-I was riding without any clothes on!
Don't you feel sick?!
ああ……全身痛いくらいで済んでる……\nとはいえ、これ以上の激しい動きは勘弁願い:
Yeah... My whole body hurts a lot...
That said, I don't want to make any more violent movements...
まあ、あの群れを倒したなら追加はないかな。\nそれで、これからどうしようか？:
Well, if you defeated that pack, I guess there's no extra.
So, what should we do now?
撤退すんのが一番じゃね？\nもう採掘どころじゃないし。:
Isn't it best to retreat?
This isn't the time for mining anymore.
そうですね……最低限採掘はできましたし……\n戻ると、本当にカオスメイデンと戦う:
That's right... We were able to mine at the bare minimum...
If we go back, we really are going to end up fighting Chaos Maiden.
うへー、それはさすがに勘弁してほしいね……: Wow, I wish they wouldn't do that...
どうやら帰投することになったみたいだ。\nどこに帰るのかわからないけども……:
Looks like she's going home.
I don't know where I'm going back to, but...
では、シリウスシュガー全機帰投！\nメイズを出るまで気を抜かないでいきましょう！:
Now then, all Sirius Sugar units return home!
Let's not let our guard down until we get out of Mays!
折角タツミヤ鉱を見つけたのに、今回は色々と大変だったねぇ。: We finally found the Tatsumiya Ore, but this time it was a lot of work.
そうですね……\n皆さんが怪我なく無事に帰れて本当に良かったです。:
You're right...
I'm so glad you all made it home safely without getting hurt.
機体の消耗も、戦闘をした割には大きくありませんでしたわ。\nこれなら、持って帰っ:
The wear and tear of the glider wasn't too severe for a battle.
This is more than enough to make up for bringing it back.
とはいえ、せっかく見つけたんだから、\nもうちょっとくらいタツミヤ鉱を採掘したか:
That said, now that I’ve found it,
I wanted to mine a little more Tatsumiya Ore!
……そういえば、この人はどうするの？: ...By the way, what are you going to do with this person?
正直、タオル1枚の変質者にしか見えないよな俺……: Honestly, I just look like a degenerate with a single towel...
このまま逮捕されてもおかしくない……\nというかその確率が高いんじゃないか……？:
I wouldn't be surprised if he was arrested like this...
Actually, isn't there a high probability of that...?
勢いでそのまま連れてきてしまいましたわね……。: We ended up bringing him here on a whim...
違法採掘者を捕らえた場合、直ちに風紀委員に通報。\nその指示を仰ぐこと……って、:
If an illegal miner is captured, report to the disciplinary committee immediately.
Asking for those instructions... Wait, there's a school rule.
……命を助けてくれたんだ。\n俺の処遇は君たちに任せるよ。:
...She saved my life.
I'll leave my treatment to you guys.
正直、ここがどこかも記憶もない状態で\n元の場所に戻されるくらいならどうとでもな:
Honestly, I have no memory of where I am.
I don't care if she puts me back where I started.
……こんな常識らしきものは憶えてるんだけど。\n肝心なことはなにひとつ思い出せな:
...I remember something like this.
I can't remember anything important...
でも、風紀委員へ通報するのはさすがに可哀そうです！\n私たちの事を指揮で助けてく:
But I'd feel bad if I reported it to the disciplinary committee!
You helped us out by commanding us...
（……見ず知らずの彼の指揮を自然と聞いたけど……\n何であたしたちは素直に従った:
(...I naturally heard his command, even though I didn't know him...)
Why did we obediently obey? Interesting...)
そういえば、自己紹介してませんでしたね！\n私は桃園めるっていいます。あなたは？:
Come to think of it, I haven't introduced myself yet!
My name is Momozono. What about you?
……確か、%usernameusernameuserna%って名前……のはずだ。: ...If I remember correctly, %user name, username, user name, %... That's the name.
……すまない。何も思い出せないんだ。\nいわゆる記憶喪失……ってやつらしい。:
...I'm sorry. I can't remember anything.
It's what you'd call amnesia.
記憶喪失……つまり、名前以外の事は覚えていないと？: Amnesia... In other words, you don't remember anything other than her name?
違法盗掘者だったらウソついてる可能性もあるよねぇ。: If he's an illegal thief, he could be lying.
……いや、その違法採掘って裸でできるものなのか……？: ...Wait, is that illegal mining something you can do naked...?
いえ、それは無理です。\nメイズに潜ることもそうですし、生身では……:
No, that's impossible.
It's the same with diving into the Maze, so in the flesh...
えーわかんないじゃん。\n裸の方が興奮して頑張れちゃう人かもよ？:
What? I don't get it.
She might be the kind of person who gets more excited and works harder when she's naked, you know?
そんな変態に見えるのか……俺……: Do I really look like such a pervert...?
現実的に考えるのであれば、他の違法採掘者に衣服や装備を奪われて、\nそのまま倒れ:
Realistically speaking, they’d be robbed of their clothes and equipment by other illegal miners
It's possible that he collapsed like that.
……そうだとしても、機体がないのは変。: ...Even so, it's strange that there's no aircraft.
あと、ウソをついてる感じはない。\n本当に記憶喪失なんだと思う。:
Also, it doesn't feel like she's lying.
I think she really has amnesia.
まあ、学生ならザルトゥーム学園の所属を\n調べればいいんじゃない？:
Well, if you're a student, you should know where Zarthum Academy is.
Why don't we check it out?
ザルトゥーム学園……？ って、いったいなんだ？: Zarthum Academy...? Wait, what the hell?
学園の事も覚えていないのですか。: You don't even remember the school?
えっと、さっきまでいた洞窟がメイズっていうんです。\nそこで貴重な資源を回収する:
Umm, the cave we were in earlier is called Mayse.
That's where the academy for pilots who collect valuable resources—
それがここ、ザルトゥーム学園です！\n……これで何か思い出せませんかね……？:
That's Zarthum Academy!
...Do you remember anything now...?
解離性健忘かな……？ 長期間の記憶を失うのは聞くけど、\n常識は持ち合わせてそう:
Dissociative amnesia, maybe...? I’ve heard that people lose their long-term memories,
You seem to have common sense...
あ、ザルトゥーム学園のこと知らないのは常識外れか。\nうーん、考える程に妙な状態:
Oh, I guess it's out of the question that she doesn't know about Zarthum Academy.
Hmm, it's so strange that I can think about it.
でも……戦いの指揮は凄かったですよ？: But... commanding the battle was amazing, you know?
確かにそうですわね……\nあの指揮で、危機を乗り切れたわけですから。:
You're right...
We were able to get through the crisis with that command.
指揮を聞いたら、勝手に体が動いた……: When I heard the command, my body moved on its own...
メイズ以外で、そういう指揮してた経験とかあんのかな？: Do you have any experience commanding things like that outside of the Mays?
経験……いや、ダメだ。それすらも思い出せない。\nなんであんな指揮ができたのか…:
Experience... No, that's no good. I can't even remember that.
I don't know why she was able to command like that...
記憶を掘り起こそうとしても、\nモヤがかかったみたいで、しかも頭痛まで襲ってくる:
I tried to dig through my memories, but...
It feels like I'm in a haze, and it's even giving me a headache... But...
（いや……そうだ。この記憶……そして、『戦闘』が出来ること）: (No......that's right. These memories......and the fact that I can fight.)
もしかして、記憶が戻ったんですか！？: Could it be that your memories have returned?!
おお、やったじゃない！\nそれで、君は何者なんだい！？:
Oh, you did it!
So, who are you?!
いや、記憶は戻ってない。\n……だけど、たったひとつだけ思い出せることがあったん:
No, my memories haven't returned.
...But there was one thing I could remember.
世界が滅亡！？\nんなわけないでしょ！！:
The world is destroyed?!
Of course not!!
ってか、唯一思い出せたのがそれってどういうこと！: Wait, the only thing I could remember was what that meant!
ふふ、冗談だとしても、\nあんまり面白くはありませんわね。:
Hehe, even if it's a joke,
It's not very interesting, is it?
……さて、気を取り直しまして。\nこの方はどう致しましょうか？:
...Now then, let's pull ourselves together.
What should we do about this man?
引き渡せば懸賞金でるって言ってたよね？\nなら、ラミはさっさと渡して換金したい！:
You said there'd be a bounty if I handed it over, right?
In that case, I want to hand over Rami and exchange the money right away!
あら、景品扱いしてはいけませんわ。\nでも、素性の知れない男性は早めに引き渡した:
Oh, don't treat it like a prize.
However, it would be best to hand over men of unknown backgrounds as soon as possible.
で、でも、引き渡したらどうなるのか分かりませんよね？\n私たちのために指揮も頑張:
B-But you don't know what will happen if I hand it over, do you?
You've done so much for us, and I feel sorry for you!
うん……可哀想……: Yeah... I feel sorry for her...
意見が割れてしまいましたね……\nちゆるさんの意見はありますか？:
We've split our opinions...
Do you have an opinion, Chiyuru-san?
……んー、メイズに潜れる男の子って珍しいでしょ？\nそれに、あの指揮は凄かったか:
...Hmm, isn't it rare for a boy to be able to dive into the Maze?
Besides, that commander was amazing... I think it's okay to take care of him.
そんなこと言って、責任は取れますの？\n衣食住も準備しないとですし。:
Can you take responsibility for that?
We need to prepare food, clothing, and shelter.
ちゃんとお世話するからさー。ご飯も３食用意するしー。: I'll take good care of you. I'm going to prepare three meals for you.
飼うなら病院にも連れて行くべき。: If you're going to keep her, you should take her to the hospital.
あはは、なら予防接種も必要じゃない？\nそれと去勢手術も受けさせて……:
Ahaha. Then you need to get vaccinated, don't you?
Also, let me have a castration surgery...
小屋をどこに建てるかは問題だよねー。\nなかなか自由に使える場所ないし。:
It's a question of where to build the cabin.
I don't have anywhere I can use it freely.
……待ってくれ。\n話が逸れてないか？:
...Wait.
Isn't that a little off topic?
というか、俺をペットにしようとしてないか！？: Actually, isn't she trying to make me her pet?!
まあ、捨て猫を拾ってきたみたいなもんだからねー。\nあ、そう考えると、拾っためる:
Well, it's like picking up an abandoned cat.
Oh, now that I think about it, should Meguru-chan take responsibility for picking it up?
うぅ……私のお小遣いで足りますかね……: Ugh... Will my allowance be enough...?
あの、なんで乗り気なんですの？\nそこはめるさんは止めるべきでは？:
Um, why are you on board?
Shouldn't you stop wearing that?
いや、というか飼う前提で話すのはやめてくれ。: No, actually, please don't talk under the assumption that I'll keep her.
でも、ペットになれば衣食住の問題は解決するよ？: But if you become a pet, the food, clothing, and housing problems will be solved, you know?
確かに衣食住が解決するのは大きいが……\nなにか人として大事なものを失う気がする:
It's true that food, clothing, and housing are a big deal, but...
I feel like I'll lose something important to me as a person.
……ちなみに、さっきのは冗談。\nちゃんとわたしもお金を出す。:
...By the way, that was a joke.
I'll give you some money too.
あ、飼う方を訂正したわけじゃないんだ。: Oh, I didn't correct the owner.
……このままだと本当にペットにされそうだな。: ...At this rate, she really is going to turn me into her pet.
あはは……流石に冗談ですよ？ た、多分。: Ahaha... I'm just kidding, okay? I-I think so.
いろいろ話しましたが、\nやはり引き渡すのが道理でしょう。それで――:
I told you a lot of things.
It would make sense to hand it over after all. And then—
はいはーい！ 今からここにいる人たちは動いちゃダメだからねー！\nもしも動いたら:
Okay, okay! The people here aren't allowed to move from now on!
If you make a move, I'll detain you with the authority of the disciplinary committee!
シリウスシュガーの皆さんですね？: You're all Sirius Sugaru, aren't you?
あれ、リリーさんに小花さん？\n風紀委員の方が、どうされたんですか？:
Huh? Lily and Kohana?
What happened to the disciplinary committee?
姜小花さんとリリー・ラヴォアさん。\n……この学園の治安を守る風紀委員ですわ。:
Jiang Xiaohua and Lily Lavore.
...I'm a member of the disciplinary committee that protects the safety of this school.
うん！ 今日はキミたちシリウスシュガーに用事があってね。: Yeah! I have some business with you guys, Sirius Sugaru today.
……逮捕！？\nいったい、何事ですの！？:
...Arrested!?
What the hell is going on?!
何かをしてしまった方は、誰でも同じことを言うのです。\n取り調べで、ちゃんと罪状:
Anyone who did something would say the same thing.
I'll tell you the charges during the interrogation.
では、連行いたしましょうか。: Well then, shall we take him in?
風紀委員たちに囲まれ、\n俺たちは問答無用で連行されていくのだった。:
I was surrounded by the prefects.
We were taken away without question.
